A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: In order for a franchise to keep going\, they need to take risks at some point\, and that's what this movie did. The Last Jedi is the best SW film since Return of the Jedi\, even with all its flaws. I'd rather see elements of the SW universe that I haven't seen before than pay for the same re-tread plot elements and imagery again and again.
